body:
Comment 3: 
hcwfrichter,

I believe you are right about cause of my problem: "... case of your current drive does
not match the case of the drive letter in GOPATH ...". I am not sure about solution.
Even if you want to change drive letter case, it should happen in EvalSymlinks, not
VolumeName.

Either way, whatever you decide to do next, changes are not accepted as patches. You
must follow http://golang.org/doc/contribute.html, if you decide to go ahead with your
proposal.

Alex
